name: Havas Edge
description:
Havas Edge is an award-winning agency with a proven track record of helping clients succeed. We're an integrated agency that embraces every media channel, a creative powerhouse that loves data and analytics, and a passionate partner that is committed to giving clients more for less.
Our Edge comes from a media-agnostic, results-oriented approach, supported by our wealth of assets and capabilities. More than 325 integrated marketing experts across 5 offices: Boston, London, Los Angeles, Portland, and San Diego; each providing local client service and targeted network specialties.
Leading DRTV media planning and buying services, fueled by VantEdge Point, our proprietary DRTV response database with over 25 years of historical data.
Full-service digital and online marketing capabilities, DRTV creative and production services, including in-house editing and sound stage, print, radio, OOH, direct mail, 25 consecutive years of growth as a member of Havas Worldwide.
